title: Destiny's Star
description: View our feature on Elizabeth Vaughan's Destiny's Star .A return to the world of the Warlands...Bethral, a beautiful warrior, and Ezren, a quick-witted storyteller, are confronted with a civil war and a tribe or warriors with their own code of honor and their own rules of pleasure and partnership. To stay alive they must learn new customs, confront their enemies, and conceal Ezren's fiery power.
author: Elizabeth Vaughan
